noun.definition: A small piece of paper, fabric, plastic, or similar material attached to an object and giving information about it.
noun.example: The label on the bottle lists the ingredients.

noun.definition: A classifying phrase or name applied to a person or thing.
noun.example: The band hates the label 'heavy metal'.

verb.example: He was labeled as a troublemaker.

usage_examples: Check the washing instructions on the label.
It is unfair to label children as slow learners.
